item.title: github: Upcoming deprecation of select Copilot models from Claude, OpenAI, and Gemini
item.description:
GitHub announced it will deprecate select Copilot models provided by Claude, OpenAI, and Gemini as part of routine model retirement to prioritize newer, more capable models and maintain a fast, highâ€‘quality Copilot experience. The post directs users to the changelog for the specific models and migration timeline and urges customers to update integrations to supported models.

  • Source: GitHub
